description: Experience elevated living in this beautifully crafted 3 bed, 3 bath concrete townhome combining modern style with exceptional comfort. Enjoy an open-concept layout with quartz countertops, engineered laminate floors, and radiant heating and cooling throughout. The spacious design offers quiet, energy-efficient living with EV-ready parking and access to SFU Recreation and Library facilities. Perfect for families seeking a safe, walkable community or investors drawn to consistent rental demand. Steps to shops, trails, and parks.  Reach out today to book your private showing!
